- How the [93mhyperconjugation[0m [93minteraction[0m [93maffects[0m [93mintrinsic[0m [93mreactivity[0m in an [93mS[0m([93mN[0m)[93m2[0m [93mreaction[0m.: [93mHyperconjugative[0m [93minteractions[0m are [93mwidely[0m [93mrecognized[0m as [93mstabilizing[0m [93melectronic[0m [93meffects[0m in [93mmolecular[0m [92msystems[0m. It is [93mworth[0m [93mnoting[0m that [93menergy[0m [93mdifferences[0m were [93malso[0m [93mevaluated[0m [93musing[0m the [93mCCSD[0m([93mT[0m)-[93mSMD[0m([93mTHF[0m) [93mmethod[0m. [93mIntrinsic[0m [93mbarriers[0m were [93mextracted[0m from the [93mtheoretical[0m [93mactivation[0m [93mbarrier[0m [93musing[0m [93mMarcus[0m' [93mtheory[0m to [93misolate[0m the [93mrequired[0m [93menergy[0m for the [93mnuclear[0m [93mreorganization[0m [93mfree[0m from [93mthermodynamic[0m [93mbias[0m.
